ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] heritrix 3 - new job error
ygData.msgSnippet: maybe that sounded like users should use the issue tracker before the list, on the contrary - *please post new issues to the list first*. further issue

maybe that sounded like users should use the issue tracker
before the list, on the contrary - *please post new issues
to the list first*. further issue handling may be done via
the issue tracker, but the list is the first place to go
to report problems.

thanks!
/steve@...



On 12/10/09 8:57 AM, steve@... wrote:
> also, the problem and fix are described in HER-1725
> 
> https://webarchive.jira.com/browse/HER-1725
> 
> if you find any further problems, please let us know
> via the issue tracker.
> 
> thanks,
> /steve@...
> 
>
